evidence.text: 2 | 2020-08-05 | Joint MOTION for Entry of Consent Decree by UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit, # 2 Proposed Order)(Wuerker, Clare) (Entered: 08/05/2020)

5 | 2020-08-31 | ORDER: The joint motion ECF 2 is GRANTED. The Agreement is APPROVED and the Agreement's terms are hereby incorporated into this Order as if fully set forth herein. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 8/31/20.

extracted.value: United States filed a Joint Motion for Entry of Consent Decree on August 5 2020 requesting the court approve the agreement; the motion was granted on August 31 2020.

evidence.text: 6 | 2020-09-09 | Joint MOTION to Appoint a Monitor by UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. (Attachments: # 1 Proposed Order)(Wuerker, Clare) (Entered: 09/09/2020)

8 | 2020-09-10 | ORDER APPOINTING MONITOR. James Conrad Welch is appointed the Monitor, pursuant to Paragraphs 129‑30 of the Agreement. ECF 2-1. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 9/10/2020.

extracted.value: United States filed a Joint Motion to Appoint a Monitor on September 9 2020 requesting appointment of a court‑appointed monitor; the motion was granted on September 10 2020.

evidence.text:
JOINT MOTION TO DISMISS
The parties, Defendant Hampton Roads Regional Jail Authority (“HRRJA”), and Plaintiff, United States, by counsel, hereby move this court to dismiss the above‑captioned matter with prejudice.

Respectfully submitted,
Dated: July 31, 2024

Case 2:20-cv-00410-RBS-LRL Document 75 Filed 07/31/24

extracted.value: United States filed a Joint Motion to Dismiss the case with prejudice on July 31 2024.

extracted.value: Joint Motion for Entry of Consent Decree filed by United States of America on 08/05/2020 requesting entry of the consent decree.

evidence.location: Entry 5 | 2020-08-31 | ORDER: The joint motion ECF 2 is GRANTED.
evidence.text: ORDER: The joint motion ECF 2 is GRANTED. The Agreement is APPROVED and the Agreement's terms are hereby incorporated into this Order as if fully set forth herein. The Court retains complete jurisdiction of this matter to enforce this Order and the terms of the incorporated Agreement until the Defendants have fulfilled their obligations therein. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 8/31/20.

extracted.value: Order approving and entering Consent Decree filed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 08/31/2020 approving the joint motion for entry of the consent decree.
